column4: News;Banteay Meanchey: Authorities in Poipet cracked down on two online gaming sites in “GOOD LUCK” on the morning of January 2 2019.------Eight Thais and Indonesians were arrested and evidence of illegal online gaming operations was seized.------The arrested had working visa
column5: but no work permit and were sent to the police inspectorate of Poipet.------Reports said that in Poipet
column6: there were foreigners living and working in online gambling and also taking drugs. ------At least one of the foreigners tested positive for drug use.------Poipet authorities are currently clamping down on illegal activity in the border town.------ ------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/401066
